import React from 'react'; export default function Basket(props) { const { cartItems, onAdd, onRemove } = props; const itemsPrice = cartItems.prezzo; const taxPrice = itemsPrice * 0.14; const shippingPrice = itemsPrice > 2000 ? 0 : 20; const totalPrice = itemsPrice + taxPrice + shippingPrice; return (

Cart Items

{cartItems.length === 0 &&
Cart is empty
} {cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{' '}
{item.qty} x €{item.prezzo.toFixed(2)}
))} {cartItems.length !== 0 && ( <>
Prezzo
€{itemsPrice.toFixed(2)}
Tax Price
€{taxPrice.toFixed(2)}
Shipping Price
${shippingPrice.toFixed(2)}
Total Price
${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
)}
); }
